messageBody:
On Thursday, January 22, 2004, at 6:27:18 PM, Mike Clark wrote:

> It's probably preaching to the choir on this list, but java.net has
> published my article titled "A Dozen Ways to Get the Testing Bug in the
> New Year":

> http://today.java.net/pub/a/today/2004/01/22/DozenWays.html

Congratulations! Thanks!

Ron Jeffries
www.XProgramming.com
I must create a system, or be enslaved by another man's;
I will not reason and compare; my business is to create. --William Blake
